title: 783: BITCOIN CAN EXPLODE BY 1,000% FROM HERE, ACCORDING TO ARK INVEST CEO CATHIE WOOD - HERE'S HOW!!
description:
ARK Invest founder and CEO Cathie Wood in a new CNBC interview says that Bitcoin has the potential to erupt en route to a price tag of over half a million dollars per BTC.

"We think that the move by institutions into bitcoin ... could add $500,000 to bitcoin's price if they moved into the tune of roughly 5% over time."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
